PAD_DarkJusticiarRemains.synopsis: Shadowheart finds the remains of the Dark Justiciars and based on her level of knowledge will make a comment. All of them meant to build up anticipation for the Shar Temple. Can be triggered multiple times.
PAD_DarkJusticiarRemains.how_to_trigger: 0. Know Shadowheart is a Sharran1. Interact with any of the Dark Justiciar remains (can be armour/weapons, so we need to remain generic)

automatic_ordering.reasoning: The provided input contains only one session named 'PAD_DarkJusticiarRemains'. Since there is only one session, there are no opportunities to establish ordering constraints (i.e., which session should come before another) or mutual exclusivity between sessions (sessions that cannot appear together). Therefore, no specific ordering or exclusiveness rules can be deduced from the given data.

PAD_DarkJusticiarRemains_0.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_DarkJusticiarRemains_0.text: Dark Justiciars fell here. Those signs we saw before were no coincidence - they led us here.
PAD_DarkJusticiarRemains_0.context: NodeContext: Captivated. Arc: SH is loyal to shar. Starting to vocalise a sneaking suspicion that this temple is a legendary Sharran site, before dismissing the thought.

PAD_DarkJusticiarRemains_1.speaker: Shadowheart
